title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 701.5 - Denial of request for record or amendment or correction of a record or personal information
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 701.5 - Denial of request for record or amendment or correction of a record or personal information

State Regulations
(a) A
denial of a request for a record or a request to amend or correct a record or
personal information shall be in writing, state the reason therefor and advise
the requester of the right to appeal. (b) A failure to provide requested records or
respond to a request to amend or correct a record or personal information
promptly, as described in section
701.3
(c) of this

Part, shall also be deemed as a denial that may be
appealed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
701.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
